00001 <?php
00009 abstract class POMTemplateParameter extends POMDcbElement
00010 {
00011         public static function &parse($text)
00012         {
00013 
00014                 $pair = split('=', $text, 2);
00015 
00016                 # if it's a name/value pair, create POMTemplateNamedParameter, otherwise, create POMTemplateNumberedParameter
00017                 # if neither can be created, return POMTemplateInvalidParameter
00018                 if (count($pair) > 1)
00019                 {
00020                         $name = $pair[0];
00021                         $value = $pair[1];
00022 
00023                         $name_triple = new POMUtilTrimTriple($name);
00024 
00025                         if (strlen($name_triple->trimmed)<=0)
00026                         {
00027                                 # ignore parameters with empty name
00028                                 return new POMTemplateInvalidParameter($text);
00029                         }
00030 
00031                         return new POMTemplateNamedParameter($name, $value);
00032                 }
00033                 else
00034                 {
00035                         return new POMTemplateNumberedParameter($text);
00036                 }
00037         }
00038 }

00045 class POMTemplateNamedParameter extends POMTemplateParameter
00046 {
00052         public $name_triple;
00058         public $value_triple;
00059 
00066         public function __construct($name, $value)
00067         {
00068                 $this->name_triple = new POMUtilTrimTriple($name);
00069                 $this->value_triple = new POMUtilTrimParameterValueTriple($value);
00070                 $this->nodeText = $this->toString();
00071         }
00072 
00081         public function update($name, $value, $override_name_spacing = false, $override_value_spacing = false)
00082         {
00083                 $name_triple = new POMUtilTrimTriple($name);
00084                 $value_triple = new POMUtilTrimParameterValueTriple($value);
00085 
00086                 if ($override_name_spacing)
00087                 {
00088                         $this->name_triple = $name_triple;
00089                 }
00090                 else
00091                 {
00092                         $this->name_triple->trimmed = $name_triple->trimmed;
00093                 }
00094 
00095                 if ($override_value_spacing)
00096                 {
00097                         $this->value_triple = $value_triple;
00098                 }
00099                 else
00100                 {
00101                         $this->value_triple->trimmed = $value_triple->trimmed;
00102                 }
00103         }
00104 
00110         public function getName()
00111         {
00112                 return $this->name_triple->trimmed;
00113         }
00119         public function getValue()
00120         {
00121                 return $this->value_triple->trimmed;
00122         }
00123 
00129         public function &getValueByReference()
00130         {
00131                 return $this->value_triple->trimmed;
00132         }
00133 
00139         public function getNameTriple()
00140         {
00141                 return $this->name_triple;
00142         }
00148         public function getValueTriple()
00149         {
00150                 return $this->value_triple;
00151         }
00152 
00158         public function toString()
00159         {
00160                 return $this->name_triple->toString().'='.$this->value_triple->toString();
00161         }
